about.summary: A collection of functions related to the study of etiologic heterogeneity both across disease subtypes and across individual tumor markers. The included functions allow one to quantify the extent of etiologic heterogeneity in the context of a case-control study, and provide p-values to test for etiologic heterogeneity across individual risk factors.

name: r-riskclustr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-riskclustr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/riskclustr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/riskclustr/riskclustr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cfef0b128ff07626ccf603c02302b92ea5cc4da8301f76155d15098c683ac404

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{posix}}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-aod
    - r-gtools
    - r-knitr
    - r-mlogit
    - r-usethis
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-aod
    - r-gtools
    - r-knitr
    - r-mlogit
    - r-usethis

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('riskclustr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('riskclustr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.emilyzabor.com/riskclustr/, https://github.com/zabore/riskclustr
  license: GPL-2
  summary: A collection of functions related to the study of etiologic heterogeneity both across
    disease subtypes and across individual tumor markers. The included functions allow
    one to quantify the extent of etiologic heterogeneity in the context of a case-control
    study, and provide p-values to test for etiologic heterogeneity across individual
    risk factors.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - blankenberg

# Package: riskclustr
# Type: Package
# Title: Functions to Study Etiologic Heterogeneity
# Version: 0.1.0
# Authors@R: person(given = "Emily C.", family = "Zabor", email = "zabore@mskcc.org", role = c("aut", "cre"))
# Description: A collection of functions related to the study of etiologic heterogeneity both across disease subtypes and across individual tumor markers. The included functions allow one to quantify the extent of etiologic heterogeneity in the context of a case-control study, and provide p-values to test for etiologic heterogeneity across individual risk factors.
# Depends: R (>= 3.5)
# License: GPL-2
# URL: http://www.emilyzabor.com/riskclustr/, https://github.com/zabore/riskclustr
# BugReports: https://github.com/zabore/riskclustr/issues
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Imports: aod, mlogit, gtools, knitr, usethis
# Language: en-US
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Suggests: testthat, covr, rmarkdown, dplyr
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-01-11 14:27:23 UTC; zabore
# Author: Emily C. Zabor [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Emily C. Zabor <zabore@mskcc.org>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-01-17 23:00:03 UTC
